## NumericalFacetProps interface

Props for the [StandardFacet()](./search-ui-react.standardfacet.md) component.

**Signature:**

```typescript
interface NumericalFacetProps extends StandardFacetProps 
```
**Extends:** [StandardFacetProps](./search-ui-react.standardfacetprops.md)

|  --- | --- | --- | --- |

|  [inputPrefix?](./search-ui-react.numericalfacetprops.inputprefix.md) |  | JSX.Element | _(Optional)_ An optional element which renders in front of the input text. |
